719160.name: Akhenaten: Rule as Pharaoh
719160.description:
An Absolute Sandbox for an Absolute Ruler | Pharaoh's Rule In Ancient Egypt



As the foremost authority, Pharaoh is entrusted with keeping the people safe and the sacred law of Maat in balance. b]Planting farms, placing administrative buildings, and constructing magnificent monuments all come with the territory.[/b]

As King of Egypt you can of course
- Feed your people
- Feed your crocodiles
- Feed your people to your crocodiles

Because being a Pharaoh isn't easy, and a little entertainment at the expense of the people never hurt anybody who mattered, did it?

â†“[/b]

ğ“‚€ A Roleplaying Game as much as a Citybuilder ğ“‹º



Everything you do has consequences - each building you make, each law you enact - they contribute something to the sacred law of Maat, or "balance" that is your divine mission to maintain for Egypt lest your society suffer. Suffer long enough and the people may rebel against you.

Akhenaten: Rule as Pharaoh is an RPG (Role-playing Game) as much as a citybuilding & simulation experience.

In addition to everything you can expect from a citybuilder, you can:

âœ” Create your character's appearance, traits, and background
âœ” Level up from an advanced variety of traits & perks
âœ” Switch from building mode to controlling your character & walking around the world you've built, as Pharaoh, immediately & without a loading screen transition
âœ” Drive your personalized Chariot around your world, including chariot racing
âœ” Inspire & restore faith in citizens with eloquent speeches
âœ” Die a horrible death if you fail and your citizens rebel against your dictatorial rule

A game in development â—­


Akhenaten: Rule as Pharaoh is being developed in Unreal Engine.

While this is being developed, you can:

â¶ Add the game to your Wishlist to be notified when it comes out
â· Join the Steam community forums for Akhenaten: Rule as Pharaoh here and post a question or suggestion. The developer reads and personally answers all discussions posted, therefore you can have an influence on the direction of the game.

Planned release: 2023.
